title: Campus Hackathon 2025
description: A 24-hour hackathon where student teams collaborate intensively to build innovative solutions, solve real-world problems, and showcase their creativity, coding skills, and teamwork to a panel of judges.

title: Career Fair 2025
description: Meet top employers, explore internships and job opportunities, attend resume workshops, and receive guidance on networking, interviews, and career planning to advance your professional development.

title: Startup Pitch Night
description: Pitch your innovative startup ideas to industry experts and investors, receive valuable feedback, network with like-minded entrepreneurs, and gain exposure in a dynamic and engaging environment.

title: Wellness Workshop
description: Participate in a mindfulness and wellness workshop designed to reduce stress, improve mental health, and maintain balance through guided exercises, interactive discussions, and relaxation techniques.

title: International Food Festival
description: Celebrate global culinary diversity with student chefs preparing dishes from around the world, enjoy tastings, cooking demonstrations, and cultural performances celebrating food and community.

title: AI & Machine Learning Symposium
description: Industry experts present the latest trends in AI and machine learning, with hands-on workshops, interactive sessions, and discussions on research, applications, and innovations in technology.

title: Spring Music Concert
description: Enjoy an evening of live music performances by student bands and solo artists, showcasing diverse styles and talents in a vibrant and entertaining concert experience for all attendees.

title: Sustainability Summit
description: Learn about sustainable living, climate action, and environmental solutions through engaging talks, interactive workshops, and networking with experts and advocates for a greener future.

title: Photography Exhibition Opening
description: Explore the creative works of student photographers as they showcase images that reflect identity, culture, and perspective, accompanied by artist talks and interactive engagement.

title: AI & Machine Learning Symposium
description: Industry experts present the latest trends in AI and machine learning, with hands-on workshops, interactive sessions, and discussions on research, applications, and innovations transforming technology today.

title: Spring Music Concert
description: Enjoy an evening of live music performances by student bands and solo artists, showcasing a variety of musical styles and talents in a lively, engaging, and entertaining concert experience.

title: Sustainability Summit
description: Learn about sustainable living, climate action, and environmental solutions through engaging talks, interactive workshops, and networking with experts advocating for a greener, more eco-conscious future.

title: Photography Exhibition Opening
description: Explore the creative works of student photographers as they showcase images reflecting identity, culture, and perspective, accompanied by artist talks, storytelling, and interactive engagement opportunities.

title: Women in STEM Panel
description: Engage with inspiring female leaders in science, technology, engineering, and math as they share career journeys, challenges, insights, and advice to encourage diversity and empower the next generation.

title: 5K Charity Run
description: Participate in a 5K run to support local children’s charities, promote fitness and healthy living, and enjoy a community-focused event filled with energy, motivation, and fundraising spirit.

title: Debate Championship Finals
description: Watch top debaters compete in the final round of the annual championship, showcasing critical thinking, persuasive communication, and public speaking skills in an exciting and competitive environment.

title: Game Development Workshop
description: Learn the fundamentals of game design and development, including Unity basics, coding, and interactive design, and create your first playable game in a supportive, hands-on workshop.

title: Mental Health Awareness Week Kickoff
description: Kick off Mental Health Awareness Week with stress-relief activities, peer support sessions, educational talks, and access to wellness resources promoting mental wellbeing across the student community.

title: Film Screening: Documentary Night
description: Attend a special documentary screening featuring award-winning films, followed by interactive discussion with the director, exploring themes, storytelling, and filmmaking insights.

title: Robotics Competition
description: Teams design and build autonomous robots to complete challenging tasks, demonstrating engineering, programming, and teamwork skills in a competitive and innovative robotics showcase.

title: Poetry Slam Open Mic
description: Share original poetry or enjoy performances by talented student poets at this open mic, celebrating literary creativity, expression, and community engagement in a lively and interactive environment.

title: Blockchain & Cryptocurrency Workshop
description: Learn about blockchain technology, crypto assets, and decentralized finance, including practical applications, investment insights, and hands-on demonstrations to understand this rapidly evolving financial ecosystem.

title: Alumni Networking Evening
description: Connect with successful alumni across multiple industries, build professional relationships, gain mentorship, and exchange ideas in a relaxed evening of networking and career development opportunities.

title: Latin Dance Night
description: Learn salsa, bachata, and merengue with professional instructors, enjoy social dancing, and experience a lively night celebrating Latin music, rhythm, movement, and community energy.
